Interface AnchorTextConstants

public interface AnchorTextConstants

This interface holds the constants used in AnchorText data structure.

Nima Asadi

Field Detail

EMPTY_STRING

static final String EMPTY_STRING
See Also:
Constant Field Values

MAXIMUM_SOURCES_PER_PACKET

static final int MAXIMUM_SOURCES_PER_PACKET
Shows the maximum number of sources/targets an AnchorText object can hold. If the number of sources/targets is greater or equal to this value, the AnchorText object is split into several smaller objects in order to fulfill this requirement.

See Also:
